name: dash-bash-utility
description: Progressive Web App for DoorDash delivery drivers with target calculator, dashers management, and address book

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run extract-jsx && npm run compile
scripts.vendor:prepare: mkdir -p vendor && curl -L https://unpkg.com/react@18/umd/react.production.min.js -o vendor/react.production.min.js && curl -L https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18/umd/react-dom.production.min.js -o vendor/react-dom.production.min.js && curl -L https://unpkg.com/lucide@0.545.0/dist/umd/lucide.min.js -o vendor/lucide.min.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add index.html dash-bash-compiled.js tailwind.css && git commit -m 'build: precompiled JSX + local vendor files' && git push origin main && git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout main
